articles.description: A new study posits that the evolution of chewing may have helped play a vital role in the evolution of humankind as a whole.
articles.content: You probably don’t think twice about chewing, but scientists now say the evolution of chewing could have played a major role in how humans evolved over time. A new study researchers published in the … [+2640 chars]
